channel.title: How much GP do you own in cash/assets
channel.description:
Question for everyone.
I have 9m cash, 20k steel throwing knives (dont even know what thats worth these days) and 1m on another account. Few sets of full rune too but that's not much.
Also off topic, how can i transfer 9m from 1 acc to another :P

item.title: How much GP do you own in cash/assets
item.dc:creator: @Javas_Java Javas Java
item.description:
@Javas_Java wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:5, topic:221204”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=290411.msg2342336#msg2342336 date=1216425315]
The only I know of to transfer items is through Bounty Hunter, and that is a really unsafe way.

Best to try it with a few small amounts until you know your boundaries and how much you are willing to lose in case of a mishap. I’m not to familiar with how this is done, however, as I haven’t tried bounty hunter before.
[/quote]

Hardly unsafe - If you sell + sara sets and tank it out in F2P it’s easy.

I tanked out about 4m of stuff in F2P to ten level 110+'s[/quote]

You can only have 1 piece of armour on at a time. Me and my friend tried to take 2 sara pl8s and it would not let us.

as in you cannot have more then 1 set of something…

Read full topic
item.source: How much GP do you own in cash/assets

item.title: How much GP do you own in cash/assets
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:2, topic:221204”]The only I know of to transfer items is through Bounty Hunter, and that is a really unsafe way.

Best to try it with a few small amounts until you know your boundaries and how much you are willing to lose in case of a mishap. I’m not to familiar with how this is done, however, as I haven’t tried bounty hunter before.[/quote]

Hardly unsafe - If you sell + sara sets and tank it out in F2P it’s easy.

I tanked out about 4m of stuff in F2P to ten level 110+'s

Read full topic

item.title: How much GP do you own in cash/assets
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

you could also do it by buying a crap load of items that are cheap in a store, but sell high in the GE or trade, and then trade them such as 20k cheese.

Although you wont transfer all the money, you’ll transfer a lot.

Read full topic
item.source: How much GP do you own in cash/assets

item.title: How much GP do you own in cash/assets
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

The only I know of to transfer items is through Bounty Hunter, and that is a really unsafe way.

Best to try it with a few small amounts until you know your boundaries and how much you are willing to lose in case of a mishap. I’m not to familiar with how this is done, however, as I haven’t tried bounty hunter before.

Read full topic
